author: Elastic
attributes.description: A population analysis machine learning job detected potential DGA (domain generation algorithm) activity. Such activity is often used by malware command and control (C2) channels. This machine learning job looks for a source IP address making DNS requests that have an aggregate high probability of being DGA activity. This is an experimental job and is therefore unsupported.
false_positives: CDN (content delivery networks) might trigger this rule and can be exempted. Applications or systems that use a number of high-entropy DNS names may also trigger this rule.
attributes.name: Potential DGA Activity
